description_text:
Hi there. Does your product “Simsonn racing simulator sequential shifter”
plug into a Fanatec wheel base. If it does does that mean it would work
with Xbox. I’m only asking because I see that other products say that it
won’t work with the q box and this doesn’t say it isn’t compatible with
anything. I look forward to hearing from you. Thanks.

conversations.body_text: Hi Jude Stone,     Currently, our sequential shifter interface is designed specifically for our upcoming in-house base and is not compatible with Fanatec bases.  Because the power wiring sequence is different, plugging it directly into a Fanatec base may cause damage to the device.
